code: import React from'react';import{Card,CardMedia,CardContent,Typography,Chip,Box}from'@mui/material';import StarIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Star';import CheckCircleIcon from'@mui/icons-material/CheckCircle';import CancelIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Cancel';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookCard(_ref){let{book,onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{onClick:onClick,sx:{cursor:'pointer',height:'100%',boxShadow:4,transition:'0.2s','&:hover':{boxShadow:8}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",height:"180",image:book.thumbnailUrl,alt:book.title,sx:{objectFit:'contain',bgcolor:'#f5f5f5'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",noWrap:true,color:"primary",sx:{fontWeight:600},children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{color:"text.secondary",sx:{mb:1},children:["\xA3",book.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:1,mb:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StarIcon,{sx:{color:'#FFD700'}}),label:book.rating,size:"small",sx:{bgcolor:'#fffbe6',fontWeight:500}}),/In stock/i.test(book.stock)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{color:"success"}),label:"In Stock",size:"small",color:"success"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CancelIcon,{color:"error"}),label:"Out of Stock",size:"small",color:"error"})]})]})]});}export default BookCard;
